title: Hutchinson's Magazine
comment: Pick up with Haggard's Treasure of the Lake, which might be in a related Hutchinson's title.

renewed-contributions.title: Once Bit, Twice-Hit
renewed-contributions.note: Author name is a pseudonym for H. C. McNeile.

renewed-contributions.title: Relative Values
renewed-contributions.note: Author name is a pseudonym for H. C. McNeile.

additional-notes: This is a British publication.  Its contents may still be copyrighted even without renewals or copyright notices, if they meet GATT copyright restoration requirements for works first published outside the US.

This magazine frequently reprinted stories that had originally appeared in other magazines.  We have not systematically checked the copyrights of those earlier publications. The first contribution renewal shown here is for the first contribution with an active CCE renewal record specifically mentioning this magazine.

The 1954 January-June CCE records the renewal of a 1927 US registration for 6 chapters of 'Sir Percy Hits Back' by Baroness Orczy, published in the December 1926 issue.  We are not sure that copyright is still in force under current US law, but mention it here for completeness.
